theaters.name: Beach Landing - General Assault
theaters.description: You are the tip of the spear. Your mission is to break shoreline defenses and draw the bulk of the Iron Conclave's attention while other forces move into position.

actII.title: Storm the Beach
objectives: Break shoreline defenses and push inland
Engage enemy forces directly
Draw the bulk of the Iron Conclave's attention
Reach the road toward the Orn River

actIII.title: Break the Line
objectives: Breach fortified enemy positions between the beach and the river
Clear the road for the siege train following behind
Link up with portal team at the Orn River Bridge

failureEffects: Bridge reinforcements arrive from the beach side

theaters.name: Beach Landing - Siege Train
theaters.description: You escort the siege engines that will crack the Coastal Keep. Without these weapons, the assault becomes a grinding war of attrition. But first, you must get them off the beach.

actII.title: Land the Siege Engines
objectives: Land catapults and trebuchets on Juno Beach
Protect siege engines from enemy fire
Begin moving equipment inland

actIII.title: Climb the Bluffs
objectives: Haul massive siege engines up the sandy bluffs
Get creative — winches, magic, beasts of burden, or brute force
Protect the equipment from saboteurs while vulnerable
Cross the Orn River Bridge and advance to the Keep

theaters.keyTension: The siege engines are slow and vulnerable. Getting them up the sandy terrain requires ingenuity. Losing them is catastrophic.
failureEffects: Act IV shifts toward attrition or sabotage

theaters.name: Portals & Bridges
theaters.description: Teleported behind enemy lines, you are the only force close enough to reach the Orn River Bridge before the Iron Conclave destroys it. The entire invasion depends on you.
theaters.entryPoint: Teleportation to a resistance-held watchtower behind enemy lines.

actII.title: Secure the Landing Zone
objectives: Emerge from the portal at the watchtower
Eliminate enemy patrols before alarm is raised
Establish a foothold behind enemy lines
Begin moving toward the Orn River Bridge

actIII.title: Disarm the Bridge
objectives: Assault the Duergar demolition platoon holding the bridge
Neutralize sappers before they trigger the charges
Disarm or destroy the explosive runes and barrels
Hold the bridge until reinforcements arrive

successEffects: Bridge secured — siege engines can cross
Ground forces link up and advance
failureEffects: Siege engines cannot reach the Keep
Enemy has time to fortify the Coastal Keep

theaters.name: Air Battle - Sky Control
theaters.description: The skies above the battlefield are contested. Enemy wyverns, gyrocopters, and war-mages threaten to turn the tide. Once you own the sky, you must land and hold the road.

actII.title: Win the Sky
objectives: Achieve air superiority over landing zones
Intercept wyvern cavalry and gyrocopter bombers
Neutralize war-mage spellcasters
Protect ground forces from aerial bombardment

actIII.title: Block the Road
objectives: Land on the inland road beyond the Orn River Bridge
Establish a blocking position against Keep reinforcements
Hold the road until beach forces break through
Prevent enemy counterattack from reaching the bridge

successEffects: Ground forces protected from air strikes
